website_summaries.verdict: Super-economic slip that covers up old or mismatched chairs nicely.
pros: Multiple design and color options, all in soft, stretchy, non-wrinkle material that holds up to washing

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price. The material is super soft and stretchy. It took me perhaps 3 minutes to pop them on and work the material around a bit to get all the seams lined up perfectly. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. I got it to cover a chair that is sitting in my loft area upstairs, and that specific chair does not get used much. The material is very thin, and ripped at the seams in a few places while stretching it over the chair. Since the material is thin, you can see a little of the original pattern through the cover. I personally would not purchase this for use in high traffic areas.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson Home

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUICK UPDATE FOR DECOR!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to cover a large, heavy office chair we recently acquired to use in our exercise room. The chair is very sturdy and heavy but also a typical black on black boring chair. This cover instantly transformed it into a fashion piece! Seriously it will keep our investment clean ( cats) and definitely gives it a home fashion look not a should be in an office appearance. I haven't washed it yet but will use gentle cycle, cold water line dry just to be sure. The other reviews were invaluable as one of the customer photos shared a picture that showed It would fit larger office type chairs --Thanks other reviewers. Will probably purchase a spare.
customer_reviews.author: CathyQ

customer_reviews.title: Good stretch, will fit any chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 old world market dining chairs that I love but the pattern and color was not going with my new style/decor of my home! I searched chair covers everywhere, even at world market which had only two options and were $39.99 a cover!! Buying new chairs was not an option so my sister in law suggested these! They were so reasonably priced that I took a chance and bought them!! They fit my chairs perfectly!!! My chairs are big and nothing would fit them, these covers stretch over them like a glove!! Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey N.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recovered my office chairs in minutes!!!! Stretched wonderfully over them even though they were upolstered. Also slipped one on my hardback dinning chairs and think I may buy more for them!! The fabric is SO SOFT TOO. Many client compliments. Fast shipping. Will add photo of befor and after!
customer_reviews.author: Christle r Peter

customer_reviews.title: Adorable design ( The same look as they show in the picture)
customer_reviews.text: These chair covers are soft to the touch and very cute design, and also very easy to put them on. They might protect your chair from the dust , but I am not sure if it protecst them from spilled drinks! Shipping was fast too. I am ordering 4 more as I have 6 Chairs and I happen to love them :)
customer_reviews.author: Sileasta95

customer_reviews.title: Office Chair Makeover!
customer_reviews.text: I decided this wasn't what I wanted for my parsons dining chairs, but rather than sending it back, I decided to try it on my office chair. What a great way to fancy up your office or cubicle! There are so many patterns to choose from. They're so inexpensive, you could change them often.
customer_reviews.author: MizCol

customer_reviews.title: They came out of the package with a small tear in the seam
customer_reviews.text: These came out of the package with a small tear in the seam. They went on the chair easily and the picture is true to what you see in the picture on the screen. They are a cream color with the floral print. I thought they were white with a floral print, but that is my fault for shopping while tired. I gave them three stars for coming out of the package with a defect. I am sending them back. They are extremely thin, and I understand that you get what you pay for, but I did not expect them to be this thin.
customer_reviews.author: TheB's

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new dining set and our cats were scratching up the seats. We bought these covers to protect the chair fabric. Not only do they do the job, they look great too. We got 2 different patterns to mix and match.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: What a difference these slipcovers make!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, I have to admit I didn’t think these were going to be much but I needed something or I would have to toss the chairs. I got these today. They took about a minute per chair to put on and they look amazing. Even if they don’t last more than six months, they are worth it. Clearly, I can’t speak to durability but I love the esthetic. I never write reviews but today I truly had to write one. If you are on the fence, take the leap. Small investment, good reward. I’ve attached a before and after picture. It’s the same chair.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and colors.
customer_reviews.text: I can't begin to express how much I love these seat covers. We have two velour chairs that attracted cat hair constantly and were a pain to clean. These covers fit perfectly and are so easy to wipe off! It took some effort to get them on as our chairs were stuffed but so worth it (it was like putting panty hose on a water buffalo). The colors are bright and lovely, we've gotten many compliments already. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Halycon

customer_reviews.title: Look great, Don’t Last
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and the low cost makes it easy to swap out for a new look. One tiny stain and that is the end though. Difficult to clean because if you run it through a regular cycle, expect the material to disintegrate and tear.
customer_reviews.author: WebGirlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast and Beautiful for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: I can't honestly find anything to complain about with these covers. The are practically perfect fit for my bar height dining chairs. They would even have fit a standard height chair because the size is specific to the seat and back of the chair. The fabric feels amazing and the only thing you need to do is pull the over the back and then the seat m, tuck where necessary and your done. Remember the fabric stretches but you don't need to aggressively over stretch while pulling, it's not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile slipcovers
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised! I have been looking for a slipcover that would work on my kitchen chairs, but most slipcovers are made for taller dining chairs and more specifically, parsons chairs. The back of my chairs are short and curved and the seat is an odd shape, but these slipcovers worked really well, and you cannot see the black and white print through the fabric of the slipcover. I had some extra fabric that hung over since the back of the chairs are short. I just reached through the underside of the chair and pulled it through to create an even seam, and then sealed it with some iron-on hemming tape.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great for updating dining room chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great option for repurposing your dining room chairs. Mine were horribly stained from kids but buying 6 new chairs seemed like such a wasted. They are awesome for covering up your old chairs, totally updated my dining room. I will say thought that the fabric is thin, but so far no holes and I have had them on for 2 months. I would recommend this to anyone looking to update your dining room chairs on the cheap but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my 110-year old wooden chair
customer_reviews.text: I do not have an upholstered dining chair; rather, a 110-year old wooden chair that needs refinishing, but until I get that done, need to cover it while it is in use. I was surprised how easily the cover adapted to the chair and since it looks so great, my refinishing project might get postponed! The cover is easily placed and removed, washable, and I am very happy with the design I chose. I might do this for my eight dining room chairs that need to be reupholstered.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Taurus

customer_reviews.title: The impact!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to spruce up my parsons dining chairs, and these covers were a great find. The colors are as shown in the picture, and they transformed the space in a few minutes. The fabric is soft and stretchy, I had no problems getting them on to the chairs. So far so good. If you want a quick and inexpensive way to change things up, these chair covers are a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Sunseeker

customer_reviews.title: We use these to cover the nice kitchen chair that our toddler sits in while she ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these to cover the nice kitchen chair that our toddler sits in while she eats/colors/paints/etc. It was a more attractive alternative than her highchair. These covers work great for this purpose; to date, nothing has seeped through to stain our upholstered kitchen chairs, and as a toddler she is pretty messy. Goes through the washer and dryer easily and everything washes out.
customer_reviews.author: Squanto

customer_reviews.title: Product is a great buy!! Very soft, easy to put on and I love the pattern/color!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product (color 8) and I was pleasantly surprised!! This cover is VERY soft. Feels like a brushed, jersey knit material. Easy to put on as others have noted. Fits well over my Pier 1 Parsons chair, but a little bunched up towards the bottom in the backside. I will say, that the fabric is not thick, so I don’t know how long they will last. I plan on buying more as a back up. Also, an important note regarding color: I bought “color 8” which appears gold online, but looks more like toffee in reality which I prefer. For the price, this is a no-brainer! Just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I had an ugly yellow office chair and I wanted to give it a new look. This fit perfectly! Time will tell how well it holds up, but you can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Bouchard DiCicco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I found this chair on the curb on trash night. I brought it home with hopes to make it my chair for my makeup corner. I was going to get it reupholstered but that was going to cost too much. I found this chair cover and bought it. Very happy with it. It looks great, fits great and brought this trashed chair new life. It saved me quite a bit of money!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Patterns do not match.
customer_reviews.text: If you are ordering one of these I suppose it would be okay. I was happy with my initial purchase. I ordered a second cover after receiving the first cover. The chair on the right was my original cover and the chair on the left is the second cover I received. You can see it is way lighter than the original. The seams on the second cover do not line up well. Maybe it would be better if they were ordered at the same time? I will be returning the second cover.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Felts

customer_reviews.title: Really great look, chairs are like new now!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They are really nice fitting except they are a little long. You can easily tuck them on the corners though and on the back, I will fold them over neatly later. First I want to wash them as they do have an ink smell. But great covers! My chairs have scratches in the leather from age and a cat we used to have. This saves me spending $200+ on new chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Light colors could be see through
customer_reviews.text: This is a snug fit, I have a pattern on the chair I covered and you can see it through this cover. It may be more noticeable to me because I know it’s there. Overall I like it, it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Bright with flare
customer_reviews.text: Just came 30 minutes ago! I was so excited to get these. I've had my little kitchen set for 15 years and it needed a touch up. I like a mix of rustic and modern. I repainted the red legs of the table to a taupe color and wanted to brighten and add flare at the same time. I have the bigger parsons chairs and these covers are snug! They fit, they are really soft and very true to the color in the pictures!! I love them! The pictures are in cozy lightening and then with more lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Jalain O.

customer_reviews.title: Chic cute comfy chair!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations!!!! I wanted to make my plain black vinyl chair a little more custom looking and more comfortable to sit on in hot summer months.... straight from the package, slipped right on, super soft, and doesn’t appear to slide around when I sit and use the chair! SO pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Fit my tall 30" counter bar stool ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Fit my tall 30" counter bar stool chairs perfectly! At first, when I received the package, I was a little "iffy" about the material and was unsure if it would be able to stretch over my chairs, but once it was on, it was a perfect, snug fit and extremely comfortable to sit on. Makes my old, tattered, bonded leather chairs look like a whole brand new chair. Would highly recommend, and I may purchase more for different looks to go with my decor, should I wish to change them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best $8.99 I've spent. Work didn't want to spend the money on a new chair despite mine coming apart and the hydrolics not working properly. They had offered me other hand me downs that had tape wrapped around the armrests. Since I knew they wouldn't reimburse me if I bought a new chair, I had to come up with the next best thing. Now I will have no more foam coming off and onto my clothes or finding a trail of it in my office.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kreipe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, our chairs were ruined by our kitten
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, our chairs were ruined by our kitten. I was so heartbroken. Those covers are amazing beautiful, and our chairs are saved. Fit like a glove, look super, feel great and very affordable. Will get more styes to alternate.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle timms

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The fit is amazing. They are so easy to put on my chairs and so easy to adjust to the perfect fit. They look like they came with the original chair. I had bought 4 chairs from a high end catalog and wanted to replace the slip covers because my cat had destroyed them. But they were So expensive to replace them , just to have them ruined again. So glad I came across these. I haven't washed them yet so I don't know how they wash but it looks like there would be no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Burns

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive chair cover in a wide variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something to cover an old chair. The material is thin without padding, but nice. The elastic holds the cover on very well. I liked all the choices and it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: but these are GREAT! The slip cover stretch fabric and accurate measurements ...
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about slip covers... not fitting correctly, looking baggy, looking cheap etc... but these are GREAT! The slip cover stretch fabric and accurate measurements were perfect for my old, faded chairs... I love them! Choosing these slip covers saved me HUNDREDS of $$$ instead of buying new chairs and I am completely happy with them! I will probably buy another set in another pattern / color so I can switch them out periodically! Totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fetgatter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I was leery but these work great on a parsons chairs. Totally change the look of your room easily. I have not washed them yet. But nice to know they can be washed. You cannot tell it’s s slip cover in my parsons chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty chair covers
customer_reviews.text: These chair covers were very bright and pretty. However, they did not fit my chairs properly, so I had to send them back. My chairs are a little over sized parsons chairs.
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for some time on the kitchen chair that I sit on daily and it still looks like new. It fits snugly and is attractive. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is just what I needed to make an old paint stained but comfortable chair useful. The print is exactly as pictured and it fit the chair perfectly I am pleased with this purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Sista Bea

customer_reviews.title: Given dimensions are smaller
customer_reviews.text: They look great, even though my chairs were 3/4” smaller than the dimensions of the covers, they were extremely difficult to put on the chairs. They do look great, and I’m happy with the quality, they probably easily fit chairs at least 1” smaller than the stated dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Reading Farmer

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly. I'm going to apply a dark stain to the legs or paint them black. This chair originally had a skirt and full upholstery including the legs. It was a nice chair but the fabric was just done. I removed the old fabric and filling from the legs as well as the skirt that it had and then ordered 2 chair covers.This was a great purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's like having a whole different chair.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update some chairs that belonged to my Mom and...Voila-a-a!!! Oh btw, I got the pillow cover from Amazon 2 years ago, I think they still sell it.
customer_reviews.author: E T Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Love these chair covers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chair covers! Should've ordered more in different colors. The material is very soft and seems like well made. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Fatema

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dining room chairs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I was going to replace my dining room chairs because my kittens had scratched them up (they are leather) but luckily I found these chair cover and they fit perfect also give the dining room a new look.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: and this doesn't look like a cover at all
customer_reviews.text: We have two chairs that our cats have clawed. This cover did the trick. The cats can no longer claw at the fabric, and this doesn't look like a cover at all. I think I like it better than the original design on the chair!
customer_reviews.author: In Cape Coma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slipcover.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these slip covers! It works perfectly in my room and they are an excellent quality. It literally looks as if I purchased the chair like this. I wish I'd known about these sooner as it would have saved me money on buying new chairs. I could not be more happy than I am.
customer_reviews.author: MrzWill

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy to have them
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for few days. My dining chairs look so different. I decided to purchase these because my two kids accidentally spill liquids... I am very happy to have them. It is made out of spandex material, soft and very stratchy.I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Spandex for my old chair!
customer_reviews.text: Super surprising - this little gem is a great thing. It looks like a new chair and fits an 80 year old wooden chair smoothly. It just stretches over the fabric parts like my favorite leggings!
customer_reviews.author: Swill

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!
customer_reviews.text: Material was thinner than I expected but very stretchy. It does shift some on my chairs so need to readjust it regularly. Nice look for a quick cheap fix. Easy to put on. Haven't tried cleaning yet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Used for larger counter stools, but still serves the same purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I actually used these for my counter stools, which are larger than average, rather than regular chairs. They serve the same function and work just fine. The cover-ups make them look brand new, and the coffee design is cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: It fit well, liked the pattern, but red dye from flower print bled onto other areas of the slip cover. There were pink smudges and color seemed to bleed outside of the lines.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heath

customer_reviews.title: It fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I did not think it was going to fit at first, but it did stretch and fit my chair beautifully. It is staying put, no stretching or sagging. I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover a stained white cloth chair, pulling it on was okay, not too difficult, it looks great, it’s a bigger chair as well so I just used a tack to secure it under the front. Would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made did not cover chair properly
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit the chair i bought it for, even though measurements were correct, struggled to get it on, did not fully cover chair
customer_reviews.author: iona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover an aging chair that we use only during holidays. Fit perfectly and looked great. Awesome value!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair Covers
customer_reviews.text: So stunned these covers fit since my chairs have extra front curve. So soft right out of the package. Love the pattern. Saved me from buying new chairs. Would recommend these covers to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is to put on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair cover and I can’t believe how easy it was to put on. Here is the before and after . I am glad I ordered this . I did measure my chair twice to make sure it would fit
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Save money, get these!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great fit and really a nice feel to them. It made some old chairs look new again. Very impressed! Saved money by not having to buy new chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P

customer_reviews.title: Same pattern, different color, vastly different quality.
customer_reviews.text: THIS slipcover in this color was excellent quality and fit. The same slipcover in a different COLOR, same pattern - an escapee from a high school sewing class. Bad fit. Bad sewing. Crooked seams. Take your chances on this product.
customer_reviews.author: m wright

customer_reviews.title: Chair covers
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy. I have 2 dining room chairs that needed a redo. They are shorter than the others with rounded tops. I bought the covers and they look great. They are simple to slip on and the material is soft. Because of the round tops I folded the Jersey over at the corners and tacked it so they fit perfectly. I am going to buy more so I can change looks.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Henry

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I had these red chairs and needed to cover them for a space. These covers fit perfect! They are SO SOFT too. The value you can not beat and I was worried about the red showing through the white but they look great!!
customer_reviews.author: amber sheehan

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of ugly dining chairs for $30 and these cleaned them right up. I do wish they had prettier options.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely purchase this again. Snug fitting and pretty easy to install onto the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. Had a super expensive chair that just did not match my daughter's new room. Put this puppy on and it is perfect now. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Hard to guess colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the covers, but #25 is dark navy blue, looks like black in the picture. Sending back and getting a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Monsipapa

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric, stretch well, works with different shaped chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs that came with my new office are sooo ugly! I found these, and I love them. Super soft fabric. The corners of my chairs are rounded, not square; so I have to tuck the corner behind. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: nopresherhere

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pattern however fabric too thin and could see red of chair through material
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Chair cover
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit my chair but that’s my fault for not measuring. It’s very pretty material and it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: allicoates

customer_reviews.title: What an easy and affordable way to 'upholster' a parson's chair
customer_reviews.text: What an easy and affordable way to 'upholster' a parson's chair! The results are instant and attractive. I will probably purchase a couple more patterns to change-out, freshen a look. Suggest you check that your chair dimensions match the cover dimensions for the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took a little effort to stretch it on but a great way to change a zhair for a holiday, season or permanently
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Hit or A TOTAL MISS
customer_reviews.text: Bought two loved them so much Placed a second order . Omg totally knock off of the first. Horrible p quality and totally didn’t fit. I’m like how could this be sane month two weeks apart same company horrible. So so so disappointed. Too cheap to return
customer_reviews.author: Fatimah

customer_reviews.title: Brand new chair with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love that instead of giving away the chair because the fabric doesn't match my new home purchase..... I just change the look with this cover. What an awesome purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Invisible Mother

customer_reviews.title: Measure 1st and then read fine print before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and found out I needed bigger size, so I had to return it. Material is stretchy and very soft pattern is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Reecie

customer_reviews.title: they worked and look really great on my chairs
customer_reviews.text: they worked and look really great on my chairs, gave it 4 out of 5 since one of the 4 i ordered wa stained but im returning it and ordering another one. extremely easy to install and changes teh whole look of my little dining room set
customer_reviews.author: Geo G

customer_reviews.title: Great way to refresh your room’s look
customer_reviews.text: Love the new look for my dining room. Only issue is the seams on the seat edges don’t stay on the sides. It doesn’t make a big difference, no one but me has noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Markarian

customer_reviews.title: Great chair cover
customer_reviews.text: This fits my chair perfectly. It was so much better than buying a whole new chair!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Cohoat

customer_reviews.title: I love that this fits perfectly on my chair and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this fits perfectly on my chair and it greatly compliment the gray seat cover I ordered together with this. My guests love it as well and I recommended this to them. I got a lot of compliments on this order.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Q

customer_reviews.title: The Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit! My son needed a chair cover & this one was definitely his style! Great seat cover and looks identical to photo.
customer_reviews.author: Eaze-E

customer_reviews.title: Am buying 4 more!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my chairs perfectly and they are so soft. The cats tried to scratch them but seems that it has deterred them because they can't get a grip. Saved my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these covers for my dining chairs. One fit perfect, one not even close! Same product, same chairs. Bummer because the fabric is cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love These Chair Covers!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chair covers! They worked perfectly for my breakfast bar stools. Super soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: tanya m livingston

customer_reviews.title: Super stretch!  Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to transform an old chair. It's super simple and quick. Fabric is soft and pattern is perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leggo

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! They are nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They are nice quality, and the items I received were well-represented by the online picture. They are super-easy to pop on and pop off. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: guinnessgirl64

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: What a cheap, easy way to refurbish a weary looking chair. My chair was super sturdy but peeling. This sure gave it a face lift.
customer_reviews.author: Ljoneshr

customer_reviews.title: a definite buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! completely changed the look of the chairs and the material is soft as well
customer_reviews.author: Nazia S

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover is great! I wasn't expecting much due to the low price, but it's holding up just great. The fabric is soft and stretchy, but not flimsy. The colors are bright, and it was no trouble to fit. Would buy more of these in the future. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Glazener

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty thin. Good for an inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4. Some fit differently than the others and one ripped while I was putting it on, but that may have been my fault. They are pretty thin. Good for an inexpensive option.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these slipcovers!
customer_reviews.text: These slipcovers are great! They totally transformed my plain old dining room chairs and they were very easy to put on. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use them to protect our chairs. Do the job, and are easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Lulu01

customer_reviews.title: You may have to tug a little bit!
customer_reviews.text: You may struggle a bit to get to fit if the back of your parsons chair is wider at the top. But since the material is very stretchy, it goes on more easily once you get to the middle of the back of the chair. Nice fit. And it's a very inexpensive upgrade and gave new life to an old chair.
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a Jersey material and very soft. Stretched over my chair perfectly and was easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased didn’t fit as advertised. Didn’t fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: SCool

customer_reviews.title: Easy inexpensive update for old chairs or just for a change of style
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I used small apholstery pins where the seat meets the back since they were slightly small for my chairs which worked out great. Holding up well after several months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dorm chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to fit for my daughters’s dorm. Definitely pulled the room together!
customer_reviews.author: Marne

customer_reviews.title: Easy quick and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Was given an ugly vanity chair and gave it a 9$ make over in 3 mins. It’s now my office chair. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two parson chairs that had a little wear on them. Easy to use, they stretch to a perfect fit. The print is so pretty and the price is nice. Love them and would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new dinette set but without the cost. I ordered these slip covers and they match perfectly! Easy to use and easy on the pocket! Highly recommend (:
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Looks amazing . Helped make the entire room better!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Upgrade for an old chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair cover fits the chair I have perfectly. It doesn't slip off and is a nice, soft, stretch, and smooth fabric. It completely transformed a dingy looking chair that the fake leather was peeling on to a pretty accent piece that matches my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Durable, soft, and great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a year and a half ago and they have held up really well. I love the pattern and it definitely helps me get the tropical theme I was going for. They hold up perfectly fine in the wash and are really easy to get back on. The material is very soft and keep my light colored chairs protected. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S.G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover!
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks just like the picture. It is very soft and easy to put on. Fabric is like a knit, very soft. Covered a black parsons chair for my office. For $8.99 I have a new chair!
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, fit nicely, but too thin and see-through
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty design, but the pattern of my old upholstery showed right through the thin fabric of this cover. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 6 were excellent. One was literally sh!tty
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with the order. I didn't like that one package of the six looked pre-used when I got it. I opened it, and there was poop of some kind on it! I couldn't return it because there weren't any more. My husband washed it, and it came out. I'm still pissed. The other covers looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Gibbs
